response.name: K8s Cluster with Username and Password
response.description: K8s Cluster with Username and Password
response.yaml:
# K8s Cluster with Username and Password
# Name of the connector Required
name: My k8s Cluster
# Non-changeable identifier of the connector, can not contain spaces or special chars. REQUIRED
identifier: my_k8s_cluster
# Org ID
orgIdentifier: Devops
# Project ID
projectIdentifer: Harness Sample App
type: K8sCluster
spec:
  type: ManualConfig
  spec:  
    masterUrl: k8s master url
    auth:      
      type: UserPassword
      spec:
        # Username for the Kubernetes cluster. Requried
        username:  admin
        # Password for the Kubernetes cluster. Reference to secret (either secret name or identifier). Required
        password : kube_cluster_password
        # Root certificate used to validate client certificates presented to the API server. Optional
        cacert: secretRef:kube_cluster_cacert

response.name: K8s Cluster with Client Key Cert
response.description: K8s Cluster with Client Key Cert
response.yaml:
# K8s Cluster with Client key Cert
# Name of the connector Required
name: My k8s Cluster
# Non-changeable identifier of the connector, can not contain spaces or special chars. REQUIRED
identifier: my_k8s_cluster
# Org ID
orgIdentifier: Devops
# Project ID
projectIdentifer: Harness Sample App
type: K8sCluster
spec:
  type: ManualConfig
  spec:  
    masterUrl: k8s master url
    auth:            
      type: ClientKeyCert 
      spec:
        # Client certificate for the cluster. Required
        client-cert: secretRef:k8s_cluster_client
        # Client key for the client certificate. Required
        client-key : secretRef:k8s_client_key
        # Client key passphrase Required
        client-key-passphrase: secretRef:k8s_client_key_passphrase
        # Encryption algorithm used when the certificate was created. Typically, RSA
        clientKeyAlgo: RSA

response.name: K8s Cluster with Service Account
response.yaml:
# K8s Cluster with Service Account
# Name of the connector Required
name: My k8s Cluster
# Non-changeable identifier of the connector, can not contain spaces or special chars. REQUIRED
identifier: my_k8s_cluster
# Org ID
orgIdentifier: Devops
# Project ID
projectIdentifer: Harness Sample App
type: K8sCluster
spec:
  type: ManualConfig
  spec:  
    masterUrl: k8s master url
    auth:      
      type: ServiceAccount 
      spec:          
        # Service account token for the service accoun. | Required
        service-acccount-token:  secretRef:service_account_token

response.name: K8s Cluster with Open Id Connect
response.description: A Deployment Stage with CodeDeploy Setup
response.yaml:
# K8s Cluster with Open Id Connect
# Name of the connector Required
name: My k8s Cluster
# Non-changeable identifier of the connector, can not contain spaces or special chars. REQUIRED
identifier: my_k8s_cluster
# Org ID
orgIdentifier: Devops
# Project ID
projectIdentifer: Harness Sample App
type: K8sCluster
spec:
  type: ManualConfig
  spec:  
    masterUrl: k8s master url
    auth:      
      type: OpenIdConnect 
      spec:             
        # URL of the provider which allows the API server to discover public signing keys. Required
        oidc-issuer-url: https://dev-00000.okta.com/oauth2/default/v1
        # Public identifier for the client that is required for all OAuth flows. Required
        oidc-client-id: secretRef:kubernetes
        # Login credentials for a user assigned to the provider app
        oidc-username: admin
        # Login credentials for a user assigned to the provider app
        oidc-password: secretRef:k8s_oidc_password
        # The client secret for the app. Optional
        oidc-secret: Secret
        # OIDC scopes are used by an application during authentication to authorize access to a user's details, 
        # like name and picture. Optional
        oidc-scopes: picture

response.name: K8s Cluster with In-Cluster Delegate
response.yaml:
# K8s cluster with in-cluster delegate
# Name of the connector Required
name: My k8s Cluster
# Non-changeable identifier of the connector, can not contain spaces or special chars. REQUIRED
identifier: my_k8s_cluster
# Org ID
orgIdentifier: Devops
# Project ID
projectIdentifer: Harness Sample App
type: K8sCluster
spec:
  type: InheritFromDelegate
  spec:
    delegateName: K8s_in_cluster
